articles.content: It speaks volumes for how far Manchester United have fallen in relatively recent history that the signing of Cristiano Ronaldo was hailed as the missing piece of the jigsaw in 2021 the player to elev… [+3352 chars]

articles.author: Stephen Killen
articles.title: Who could England play in the World Cup quarter-finals if they beat Senegal? - Football.London
articles.description: Senegal stand in the way of England making the World Cup quarter-final after both sides progressed from the group stage, but who could the teams face in the next round if they win?
articles.content:
England could meet reigning champions France in the World Cup quarter-finals should they overcome Senegal.
Marcus Rashford moved top in the hunt for the Golden Boot as his brace ended Wales' fading … [+2923 chars]
